text:
I may just be dumb here, and I've done my due diligence searching...

I've been doing this HS development thing for a year and change now, and to this day I can't get my VSCode set up to continue handling tag completion correctly... I've set up the HubSpot extension, I've added the file associations, I've added the emmet languages, but as soon as I switch a file to HTML-HubL I lose all tag completion support in HTML, and it doesn't seem to be doing anything with the HubL either...

Anyone out here who might have their VSCode set up properly to fix all that that'd be willing to point me in the right direction?
